title: A friend didnt get my gift
body: I have recently bought Rp and gifted mt friend Jinx elf skin but, he said he didnt recieve it. Please tell me whats the issue.

replies.body:
Looking into this for you, I do see that you sent Ambitious Elf Jinx to a friend who in return sent a Santa Baron icon your way.  Have him relog just in case if he hasn't received the notification.  

If you still have issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can confirm it was sent to the right player!
